data.name: CompCategoriesTextMain
data.value: Focusing on all environmental related. All competition Professional, Kids and amateurs must comply with mentioned roles and submitted photos must be related to environmental issues such as:

data.name: CompCategoriesTextSub5
data.value: All areas associated with the environment

data.name: introductionText
data.value: This competition aims to raise environmental awareness within the community and foster a new generation that understands the importance of the environment, integrating it into their daily lives.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsText10
data.value: Winners will be notified through email and phone number.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsText1
data.value: The competition will start on 1 of September 2024 and end on 30 September 2024.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsText2
data.value: All contribution must be submitted in (JEPG) or (JPG) or (PNG) format.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsText3
data.value: Total contribution is not exceeding 4 photos max size for all images shall not exceed 4GB

data.name: TermsAndConditionsText4
data.value: Editing, Photoshop and tuning is permitted, on the condition it doesn't exceed 20%.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsText5
data.value: Photos must be from Yanbu Industrial city.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsText6
data.value: Photos can have a title and a description to to clarify the purpose/the message that you want pass of your photo.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsText7
data.value: The participant must write their name, phone number, and email.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsText8
data.value: Participating in this competition is a clear declaration from the participant that submitted photos are belong to him and he is authorizing us The Royal Commission in Jubail and Yanbu use subject photos in any publications with full rights without getting any permission from the mentioned.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsText9
data.value: The Royal Commission in Jubail and Yanbu has the right to reprint and copy the photos for free for any media purposes in newspapers, magazines, exhibitions, or annual calendars, as well as for all types of publishing by partners. Participation in the competition is considered acceptance of this.
